metadata.title: CVE-2017-2625 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: It was discovered that libXdmcp before 1.1.2 including used weak entropy to generate session keys. On a multi-user system using xdmcp, a local attacker could potentially use information available from the process list to brute force the key, allowing them to hijack other users' sessions.

criterions.comment: libxdmcp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.1.2-3').
